https://tmrev.io/movie/699888-Belsen: Our Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y94DIUozuQjiUn776zxQx4lk3ST.jpg Survivors of the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp eloquently and movingly tell of their experiences of deportation, family destruction, and their own survival, together with the history of its place in the Nazi death camp system and its liberation by the British army in April 1945. Belsen: Our Story
